summary: On July 27th Frank Chaparro hosted the third installment of The Exchange, The Block's APAC focused webinar series.   In this installment, Frank was joined by panelists from major companies from both East and West to explore a single question: How investments interest from the West impacts the East.
title: The Exchange - Institutional Investments from East to West | Full Webinar
content: On July 27th Frank Chaparro hosted the third installment of The Exchange, The Block’s APAC focused webinar series.
In this installment, Frank was joined by panelists from major companies from both East and West to explore a single question: How investment interest from the West impacts the East.
Michael Sonnenshein – Managing Director, Grayscale Investments
Kyle Davies – Co-founder & Chairman, Three Arrows Capital
Seth Ginns – Head of Liquid Investments & Managing Partner, CoinFund
You can view the webinar in its entirety below:
